entries.title: Death Stranding Director's Cut is free on the Epic Games Store right now
entries.description: Epic gets into the Strand spirit on Christmas.

entries.title: 2022 was a stellar year for adventure games
entries.description: Pointing and clicking our way to nirvana.

entries.title: Stealth is everywhere in games, but the innovations of Thief have been forgotten
entries.description: Keeping quiet and concealed in shadow is no longer in vogue—which makes Thief a refreshing replay.

entries.title: Marvel's Midnight Suns has the best amnesiac protagonist since Knights of the Old Republic
entries.description: Firaxis imbued its fish-out-of-water hero with unexpected personality.

entries.title: The weirdest news stories of 2022
entries.description: A roundup of the bizarre happenings you might have missed amid everything else that was going on.

entries.title: Turns out I can't strategize better than Ferrari. Thanks for letting me know, F1 Manager 2022
entries.description: I've been humbled by my career of misfortune with Alpha Tauri.

entries.title: In 2022's city builder boom, Farthest Frontier's survival systems stand out
entries.description: Survival city builder Farthest Frontier is fraught with diseases, injuries, bear attacks, raiding parties, and even the occasional bee sting.

entries.title: Today's Wordle 554 answer and hint for Sunday, December 25
entries.description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for the #554 puzzle.
